snippet: Britain’s Defense Ministry said Friday that it had begun an investigation after graphic photos surfaced appearing to show at least one British service member posing next to the corpse of a Taliban fighter in Afghanistan in 2012.
abstract: Britain's Defense Ministry says that it has begun an investigation after graphic photos surfaced appearing to show at least one British service member posing next to corpse of a Taliban fighter in Afghanistan in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s Defense Ministry said Friday that it had begun an investigation after graphic photos surfaced appearing to show at least one British service member posing next to the corpse of a Taliban fighter in Afghanistan in 2012.

headline.main: Afghanistan: British Military to Investigate Photo of Soldier Cavorting Next to Dead Insurgent
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: British Military to Investigate Photo of Soldier Cavorting Next to Dead Insurgent
